text: Magic is a 1978 American psychological horror drama movie directed by Richard Attenborough and based on the 1976 novel of the same name by William Goldham. It stars Anthony Hopkins, Ann-Margaret, Burgess Meredith, Ed Lauter and David Ogden Stiers and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 horror movies Category:1978 drama movies Category:1970s psychological movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard Attenborough Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies featuring puppetry Category:Movies about murder Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Dissociative identity disorder in movies Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:American psychological movies
title: Magic (1978 movie)
